name: Berry Scarf
description: Berry Scarf is based on a traditional bow tie scarf and designed with bobble and knot details. The scarf is very light and easy to carry. This pattern includes Kids/Adults size together so you can wear the same scarf with your kid. You can see the tutorials on the link below.
full_text: Berry Scarf is based on a traditional bow tie scarf and designed with bobble and knot details. The scarf is very light and easy to carry. This pattern includes Kids/Adults size together so you can wear the same scarf with your kid. You can see the tutorials on the link below. https://youtu.be/v4ELGb_-C98
